mapper.select:
-- retrieveNrmSearchList 리스트 조회 select NRM_ID as nrmId ,NRM_NO as nrmNo ,NRM_NM as nrmNm ,ISS_AUTH as issAuth ,APLC_NO as aplcNo ,APLC_NM as aplcNm ,GET_DT as getDt from IRIS_KNLD_NRM where del_yn ='N'
and NRM_NO = #{nrmNo}
and NRM_NM like '%${nrmNm}%'
and ISS_AUTH like '%${issAuth}%'
order by NRM_ID desc

-- retrieveNrmSearchList 규격 상세 조회 select NRM_ID as nrmId ,NRM_NO as nrmNo ,NRM_NM as nrmNm ,ISS_AUTH as issAuth ,APLC_NO as aplcNo ,APLC_NM as aplcNm ,GET_DT as getDt ,ENCT_DT as enctDt ,LAST_RFRM_DT as lastRfrmDt ,SUBSIDIARY_INFO as subsidiaryInfo ,LANG as lang ,PCE as pce ,PAGE_CNT as pageCnt ,ABST as abst ,ATTC_FILE_ID as attcFileId ,FRST_RGST_DT as frstRgstDt from IRIS_KNLD_NRM where del_yn ='N' and NRM_ID = #{nrmId}
